items.description: Modifications to the Minecraft base files to assist in compatibility between mods.
items.title: Minecraft Forge

items.description: A powerful fork of the Fabric project.
items.title: Quilt

items.description: A lightweight, experimental modding toolchain for Minecraft.
items.title: Fabric

items.description: A lightweight mod loader for Minecraft designed to provide simple, high-performance and reliable loader functionality for mods which don't need to modify game mechanics.
items.title: liteloader

items.description: A Mod Loader for 1.13-1.13.2 (even Snapshots).
items.title: Rift

items.description: Everything related to modding 1.9/1.10 snapshots in one place.
items.title: Meddle

items.description: A lightweight, reflection based mod loader which aims to be user friendly and later version independent.
items.title: RopeMC

items.description: Custom Skin Loader for Minecraft.
items.title: Custom Skin Loader

items.description: A Minecraft Forge Mod allows players load custom skin & cape textures.
items.title: Universal Skin Mod

items.description: Tinkers' Construct is a mod about putting tools together in a wide variety of ways, then modifying them until they turn into something else.
items.title: Tinkers Construct

items.description: Immersive Engineering is a tech mod with a certain charm, based on the ideas and concepts, and with most assets created by Damien Hazard.
items.title: Immersive Engineering

items.description: Botania is a tech mod in essence. The theme is natural magic.
items.title: Botania

items.description: A server-friendly and content-rich blend of magic and technology! Title is three different mod names, but of the same series and usually played together.
items.title: Thermal Foundation + Dynamics + Expansion

items.description: Greatly expand and improve the Minecart system in Minecraft.
items.title: Railcraft

items.description: Actually Additions is a technology mod that adds various utilities like multitools, item magnets, atomic reconstructors and so on.
items.title: Actually Additions

items.description: A Minecraft Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world. Mainly focused on item storage.
items.title: Applied Energistics 2

items.description: One of the best tech mod there is, but really overpowered in the late game. Adds things like a Draconic Power Core which no one has been able to fill yet...
items.title: Draconic Evolution

items.description: A large ender themed mod, that just adds lots of new fun things.
items.title: Ender IO

items.description: A mod that adds rockets and new planets to explore. Expandable with addons.
items.title: Galacticraft

items.description: OpenComputers is a mod that adds computers and robots into the game, which can be programmed in Lua 5.3.
items.title: OpenComputers

items.description: Adds computers based on Lua (5.2 and 5.3) into Minecraft.
items.title: ComputerCraft

items.description: Adds Star Trek and other franchise like ships, weapons, transporters and so on into the game. Also adds new planets (dimensions).
items.title: WarpDrive

items.description: AntiCheatReloaded helps server admins easily identify and block malicious users by monitoring and analyzing the behaviour of their players.
items.title: AntiCheatReloaded

items.description: Allows the connection of newer clients to older server versions for Minecraft servers.
items.title: ViaVersion

items.description: AdvancedKitsReloaded is a Kit managing plugin for Minecraft servers which runs Bukkit, CraftBukkit, Spigot and Paper (>1.8). With this plugin you can easily create/edit/delete your kits and you can customize it as much as you'd like.
items.title: AdvancedKitsReloaded

items.description: WorldGuard lets you and players guard areas of land against griefers and undesirables, as well as tweak and disable various gameplay features of Minecraft.
items.title: WorldGuard

items.description: CraftBook lets you create magically extending bridges, compact Redstone circuits, complex Minecart mechanics, and much more â€” all without a client mod and fully customizable by the server.
items.title: CraftBook

items.description: Open shared Minecraft network for advertising public and local host servers.
items.title: Connect

items.description: Manage permissions.
items.title: LuckPerms

items.description: Log everything your players do. Literally 1984.
items.title: CoreProtect

items.description: Formerly known as MCPC+. The original server implementing the Forge and Bukkit API.

items.description: A Bedrock Edition Server providing support for plugins supporting the Nukkit API.

items.description: A self-hosted Minecraft server using Docker containers.

items.description: PaperMC server with out of the box Geyser and Floodgate support using docker.

items.description: Fork of  that embeds a discord bot for easy starting and stopping of the server.

items.description: Lightweight from-scratch server implementation.

items.description: A server implementing the Forge and Bukkit API.

items.description: A custom launcher for Minecraft that allows you to easily manage multiple installations of Minecraft at once.

items.description: A powered Minecraft launcher that supports a lot of features.
